div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem vijo
die Julij anno quo supra

The samyn day Thome Watsone conuikit be ane Suorne assis'
thomas mar forspekar for the forstallin of the burghe' in the wrang
uys' byinge of woll one landwarte and to amend as law will
and forber' in tyme to Cum

The saide thomas conuikit for the forstallin of the tone in bying' of
Skinnis

The saide day William nicholsone conuikit be the saide assis' for the
for the forstallin of the tone in the byinge of woll et cetera

The saide day the aldirman Consale and communite of Abirdene
that was present for the tyme ordanit the balyeis to pas'
throw the toune and gathtir the xl merkis of contribucion that was
grantit to the commissaris that passit and defend' thar' heretage
and ordanit the taxtaris to Sytt done and gif the saide contribu
cione extendis nocht to xl merkis to mak thar billis samekile

The saide day the Consal and Communite gathreit for the tyme
be the warning of the hand' bell throw the haill tone gran
tit ane thridpartis fischingis of the wattir of Done to Alexander rede
aldirman for the termes of fyve yeris to giddir to be runnyn
at the next generall assedacion' of the toune to be maid' Ande
chesit thir personis vndir writin Alexander menyeis John Culane Johne Colison'
thomas prat Jh'Jh' overwrites 'W'.one Wormet commissaris to Sett the said' thrid
part of nethis fischingis to the aldirman for the contentacion of the takis
follouit be the Relict of Richard Kintor' and for the defens' of that pley
and ordanit ane assedacion and ane Commission' in deuforme to
be maid' to the aldirman for the saide v yeris vndir thar' common
Sell It makinge nay dirogacion tile his tak that he suld'
haue of the tone

The saide day the Consale and Communite ordanit the balyeis to
pas' and gathir in the wattir malys to freithe the tone and
quhay that pait nocht thar' malis to tak thar' nethis
furthtwith in defalt of pament of thar' malys

The saide day William buchane grantit him avand' xv s' and
x d' to the Relict of murthow glenmaluyn quhilkis the balyeis
chargit him to remane within the tolbutht quhile he pait
the saide Some

The saide day Richerd Wricht was fundin avand' to
thomas prat xxxv s' g' Scottis money for werk to be
done et cetera

Jacobus dei gracia rex scotorum Omnibus probiis omnibus probis hominibus suis ad quos presentes
littere peruenerint Salutem sciatis nos quoddam actum et decretum per
duos nostri consilij inferius discriptos Datum et promulgatum vt vtrumque
intellexisse sub hac forma At Edinburgh' the xix day of Junij
the yer of god ane thousande iiijc nyntj and four yeris the lordis
of consale vndirwrittin that is to say maist' Reuerende and Reuerend faderis
in god Robert archibischop of glasgow george bischop of Dun
keld in noble' and mychtie lordis archibald Erle' of Angous' and chanceller'
of Scotlande archibald Erle of Ergile William Erle marscheale Jhon'
lord glammys Androw lord gray William lord borthuik laurence lord
oliphant Robert lordl lile Jhon' lord Drummond' William lord
of Sancte Johannis venerabilis faderis in god george abbot
of Dunfermling Robert abbot of Kelso george abbot of paslay
mastir Richert muirhed dene of glasgw and secretar to our Souerance
lord mastir Jhon' fresale dene of Restarik and clerk of the regester
sere Duncan forestar of Skipyng' kinge comptrollar to our Souerane
lorde Jhon' ogiluy sone' and appering to James lord ogiluy of Arly
sere James allerdes provost of our lady kirk of the heuch and maistir
Richert lausoun' Anent a terme' assignit be a bill to the aldirman
baileis and communite of Abirdene to provid and schew sic richtis as thai
wald wys' anent the clame' of the forest of stokat and the castell hill
and diuers' vthiris placis clamyt to pertene to our Souerane lorde Our
Souerane lordis aduocat and Androw Wod comperand' for thar Interess'
and the part of our Souerane lord Alexander Red Aldirman of Abirdene
and the procuratouris of the saide toune' beande present The chartir and
Infeftment maide to the saide tovnn' be king Robert brois' of maist
nobill mynde at lenth' seyne hard and vndirstandin The lordis
of consall tharwith riplie avisit decretis and deliueris that for ocht that
thai haue yit sene the said aldirman balyes and communite sale breuk and
Jois' the said burgh' of Abirdene with the pertinence as thai breukit
obefor' becaus' thai clamyt the said boundis ande placis be wertew
of the said charter ay and quhile thai be lauchfullie present tharfra and
but preiudice of our Souerane lordis richt Extractum de libro actorum
per me Johannem fresale Decanum de lestarik clericum Rotulorum
et regum et consilij Suppremi domini nostri Regis sub meis signo et
subscripcione manualibus Quod quidam actum siue decretum ac
omnia et singula in eodem contenta in omnibus suis punctis et
articulis approbamus Ratificatus et pro nobis et successoribus nostris ut
premissum est confirmauus Datum sub testimonio magni sigilli nostrj
Apud Edinburgh' vesimo vicesimo die mensis Junij Anno Domini millesimo
quadringentesimo nonagesimo quarto Et Regni nostrj Septimo
et cetera
Confirmacio Actj
et cetera

James be the grace of god king of scottis
At Edinburgh' the last of Junij the yer of god JM iiijc lxxxxiiij
yeris The lordis of counsale vndir writyn that is to say a maist Reuer
end fadir in god Robert Archbischop of glasgaw noble' and mychtie lordis
Archbald Erle' of Angous' and chancellar of scotland archbald Erle'
of Ergill Jhon' lord glammys laurence lord oliphant maister richerd
muirhed dene' of glasgaw and cl'l' overwrites 'h'.erk of the regestir mastir William Wawan
officiale of loudiane' Jhon' ogiluy sone' and apperand air to James
lord ogiluy of Arly And mastir Richert lausoune' In the actione'
and caus' persewit be the aldirman bailyes counsall and communite of
Abirdene' agannis mastir Androw Caidioue to her' a decret of the
lordis of of consall gevin for mill defens' agane' thame for the
said mastir Androw anent the varanding and keping of him of ane
tak and assedacioune' of ane half nettis fisching of the Raik vpone'
the wattir of Dee and tueching the soume' of ix barellis of salmond'
and ane barell of girsillis yerlie' of tua yeris retretit and adnullit
for diuers' causis contenit in the summondis the said mastir Androw beand'
lauchfullie summond' and chargit to produce and schew the letter of tak ande
assedacione' that he herd of the said fisching oftymes callit and nocht compe
rit the said decret gevin for the said mastir Androw at lentht sene
hard and vndirstandin and allegit be the saidis aldirman and procuratouris
of Abirdene that the said tak was maid to the said mastir Andro
vndir ane condicion' that the said mastir Androw suld Remane' in the said tone'
tharapone producit the copy of the said letter of tak Ande Elene' martyn
spous' to the saide mastir Andro beand' requirit to produce the princi
pale letter of tak and denyit be hir the lordis of consall beand'
avisit with the rychtis resonis and allegacions' of the saidis partiis decretis
and Deliueris that becaus' the said act' and decret maid mensioun' that
the sad Aldirman bailyeis and communite suld varand' the said mastir
Androw the said tak eftir the forme' of the of the said letter of tak And the
said maister Androw nocht brigand the samyn lik as he was chargit
for the verificacione' of the said matir that tharfor' the execucione' and
affeit of the said decret gevin for the said mastir Androw in the said
mater sa be pro supercedit and be of nay strenth nor' vigour' in
Jugment nor' eteuth' quhill the saide maistir Andro produce ande
schew the saide letter of tak befor the lordis in presens of the partij And
this superceding to be vithout preiudice of the Rycht of ony the saidis partijs
Extractum de libro actorum per me Jhohannem fresall Decanum
de lastarik clericum Rotulorum et registri ac consilij suppremj domini
nostri regis sub meis signi et subscripcione manualibus
Johannes freselThe name is followed by a sign manual.

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xjo die Julij
anno quo supra

The saide day Will Dalgarnoche conuikit for the strubulance of ellene
rogerson and to Amend as law will and to pay j li' wax to the haly
blud' licht

The saide day Johnhe grige was conuikit be ane Suorne assis'
Williame blinsel forspekar for the forstallin of the tone in the
byinge of woll and skinnis and to amend as law will

The saide day thome quhit come Sourte as law will to entir
Dauid Kintor yongar one monunday cum xv dais befor the balyeis
to ansuer' to William blinsellis paper et cetera

The saide day Alexander menyeis Jonhne Culane and William blinsele
declarit that thai war' chosin and Suorne apone assis' with wthiris
personis anent ane Sellar' tak betuix Jonhne Colison and Jonhne of
Kintor' quhilkis deliuerit that gif the saide John Colisone walde depone
be his aithe that he was nocht lauchfullie warnit to remoyve
out of the saide butht he al remane with the samyn and gif he will
nocht suer' he sal deliuer the key and the maile to the said' Kintor'

the saide day the balyeis assignit monunday cum xv dais to Duncan
smitht to ansuer' to Alexander smitht myrtone for the wranguis'
Intrometinge with the berne and petous' and haldis tham nocht vp and
has resauit xl s' of the maile of tham

The saide day the balyes ordanit ane officiar' to distres' thomas
chamer talyour' and latt it agane to borghe' and it be askit and warne
him to comper one monunday that next cumis to ansuer'
for the wranguis' haldin of xxiiij s' of maile to compt and rek
ning

The saide day it was deliuerit statut and ordanit be the aldirman
and consale that canny leis spous' to Jonhne of camer for the gret
offens' and strubulance done be hir to Thome Waus and his wiff
scho sal pay xxtj s' to Sanct nicholes werk of the v merkis
akit one hir' obefor nocht remittand' the remanent of the saide some
or ellis scho sal entir hir' persone to be t in the goyff one monunday that
next cumis be ix houris and stand thar' quhile iij yeris houris eftir nowne
for the quhilkis Jonhne retre come Souerte to be fulfillit be
his hand vphaldin and Johne chamer oblist to freithe him

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xiiij die
Julij anno quo supra

The saide day comperit Alexander chamer in the schipraw offerit to
the balyeis Alexander chamer and Dauid mar' xxxv s' In gold In the last
complet and finale pament of v li' and x s' of his rude malys
of this yer' allegeand' that he hed pait in wyne iij li' and
xv s' at commavnd' of the tone and askit ane acquitance
of the saide v li' and x s' of this Instant yeris maile
quhilk xxxv s' the saide balyeis refusit to rescisit sayand'
thai knew nay pament of the saide iij li' and xv s' in and wyne
nocht withstandinge walde he pay thame the haile v li' and x s'
thai wald resaue it quhar' for he protestit Solempnitlie for
remede of law

the saide day El Kr Cristiane lilburne grantit avande
to Jonhne blak viij s' quhilk the balyeis chargit hir' to pay
within terme of law

The saide day Anthonius laurence grantit him aving to Duncan
Colisone xlij s' Scottis money and saide that Jonhne Colisone
his ward hed his obligacionis of certane money strenyeabile
for gretar Somes

The saide day Jonhne retre entirit Canny leis within the court
to fulfill the ordinance of the aldirman and consal eftir the tenor'
of the ak maid tharapone obefor'

The saide day Jonhne chamer entirit canny leis his spous' to the
balyeis eftir the tenor of the akis maid tharapone obefor' as he
allegit

The saide day thome Waus allegit In presence of the balyeis
that Canny leis hed nocht fulfillit the deliuerance of the aldirman
and consale eftir the tenor of the ak maid' obefor' and askit the
balyeis to ger' the said' act be fulfyllit et cetera

The saide day Anthonius laurence procurator to the executouris and tutouris to the
barnis of vmquhile arnalde vanstakinburghe grantit
him to gif to mastir Alexander gordone vicar' of Stiruelinge
ane acquitance of ij ros' noblis or ij li' g' he payand
him xiij s' Scottis and the said mastir Alexander denyit the
saide xiij s' bot gif he pait him xx li' g'

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene in pretorio eiusdem xviij die
Julij anno quo supra

The saide day the court wardit schew for law and gaf for dome
that Jonhne Cristone is quyt of xxtj s' clamit and follouit
be Alexander hay for certan wederis and the saide Alexander in Amerciament of
the courte for the wranguis' borghe' strekin apon the saide
Jonhne et cetera

The saide day Jonhne brogane oblist him be his hande vphaldin
to the balyeis to finde sikir caucion to pay j barrell of grils'
to Dauid barbour' within viij dais and to caus' his souerte to ak
him this nicht or' to morne for parte of pament of ane barrell
of Salmond' aucht to the saide Dauid and to reconpens' him
the remanent of the valour' betuix the barrele of Salmond'
and the barrell of grils' to the saide Dauid this tyme tuelff mo
neth'

The saide day gilbert gareauche and Williame moir' deponit
the gret aithez that thai lauchfullie prisit ane Siluer spvne
present to thame be Androw nachty seriand' pertening to thomas Jame
sone
to viij s' quhilk was plegit be the saide thomas to Androw
michelson for v s' and x d' tharfor the balyeis ordanit the saide
Androu nachty officiar' to offir' the saide Spvne to the saide
Thomas And' the saide officiar' lauchfullie preuit that he hede
offerit the saide spwne obefor' diuers' tymes to the saide thomas
he payand the saide v s' and x d' quhilk he coud' nocht gett
quhar'for the balyeis ordanit the officiar' to deliuer' the saide
Spvne to the saide Androw michelsone and caus' him to tak
the remanent of the Siluer of the saide Spvne and gif to the
saide Thomas

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxj die Julij
anno quo supra

The saide day Williame Kintor' grantit him avand to Androw
Culane yongar j barrel of Salmond' quhilk he suld pak to him
als' Sone as vthiris pakit to him

The saide day Jonhne Wormet was lauchfullie callit and nocht
comperit to ansuer' to the borghe strekit one him be Johne
thomsone for the wranguis' haldin fra him of xl s' of the rest
of tua li' g' tharfor the aldirman and balyeis ordanit Androw nachty
officiar' to pas' and tak ane distres' of the saide Jonhne Wormetis
and lat it agan gif it be askit and warne him to comper this
day xv dais to ansuer' to the saide borghe as the secunde day
of proces'

The saide day Williame Kintor' grantit him avand j barrell
of Salmond to Alexander rede aldirman to be pait at his will

The saide day Jonhne chamer grantit him av to pay xx s' to Sanct
nicholes' werk at the will of the Consale for the offens' done
be his wyf to Thomas Waus and his wyf obefore

The saide day Wylyame' lammentone' was' conwykyt
be a suorne' syis' Alexander schawmer fforspekar'
ffor a commwnd nycht walcar' and to amend as'
law wyl and to fforber' in tyme' cumeng

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem pennultimo
die mensis Julij anno quo supra

add.foreign: beuerlay pro disobediencia ballivi et cetera

div.p:
The saide day Alexander beuerlay was in Amerciament of the court be ane
suorne assis' henrik horum forspekar for the dissobeing of
Dauid mar' balye in the execucion of his office and to Amende
as law will et cetera And atour it was ordanit be the saide assis'
that the saide Alexander for the offence befor expremit sal cum one
Sonday that next cumis In tyme of the hie mes' to Sanct
nicholes' kirk In presence of the pepile in the queir' barlege
with ane lous' gone havand' ane maid candile contening
j li' of wax in his hande and ask the said balye forgyvnes
and offir' the candile to the haly blud' licht Ande gif euir the
saide Alexander committis sic offens' to the saide bailye or ony
vthir officiar' in tyme to cum he sal pay xl s' to Sanct
nicholes werk vnforgevin And bath the said partiis was oblist
be the fathtis of thar' bodiis to stand at the deliuerance
of the saide assis'

Curia balliuorum legalis de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
quarto die mensis augusti anno quo supra

The saide day the balyeis assignit monunday cum xv dais
to William philp to ansuer' to the borghe strekit one him be
Walter atkin for the wranguis' haldin fra him of xliij s' and
viij d' gevin to him in onwartis of demi ane land bocht fra Alexander
rollande as the secunde day of proces'

The saide day thir personis vndir writin that is to say Alexander rede
aldirman sere Jonhne ruthirfurd Alexander chamer the fadir Alexander menyes
Robert blinsele Dauid menyeis Jonhne of Culan Johne Colison'
thomas prat Jonhne Wormet Androw branche and Dauid
mathesone grantit Ilkan of tham to gyff x s' to be gevin
to the propin in wyne wax and spice to my lord duc of ros'
quhilkis salbe allouit in thar' girssomes at the next
generale assedacion to be maide

add.foreign: the copy of the letter grantit be the kinge to attache ale wollis hidis and Skinnis et cetera that pas' out of this serefdom et cetera

div.p:
Jacobus Dei gracia Rex Scotorum vniuersis et Singulis legiis
et subditis'is' overwrites 'us'. nostris ad quorum noticias presentes littere peruenerint Salutem
Quia Intelleximus quod burgenses et mercatores burgi nostri de Abirdene
quando magna dampna incommoda hactenus perpessi sunt ob ex
portacionem lane pellium et corriorum extra vicinitatum nostrum de Abirdene
in contrarum preuilegiorum et libertatis dictorum burgensuum in
fraudem nostre magne Custume dicti burgi Nos Igitur accen
dens et perpendens infrictionem dicte libertatis et huiusmodi dampna
nostra et dictorum nostrorum burgensium Commisimus et presencium tenorum
committimus preposito balliuis et burgensibus dicti burgi nostri qui pro
tempore fuerunt eorumque deputatis liberam facultatem et plenariam
potestatem eschaetand' et ad vsum nostrum appropriandum et capiendum
huiusmodi bona lanas pelles coria sic extra dictum vicecomitatem
et libertatem dicti burgi abducta seu Impostrum fortitam abdu
cenda absque solucione nostre Custume De quibus quidam bonis
eschetatis concessimus et presencium tenorum concedimus dictis burgensibus burgi
nostri de Abirdene dimidietatem eschaete eorumdem pro eorum laboribus
sumptibus et expensis faciendis circa eorum eschaetacionem Aliam
vero dimidietatem dicte eschaete ad nos Importare et de eisdem
bonis annuatim in nostro scaccario compotum Reddere tenebuntur
prepositus et balliuj burgi supradicti Quo circa vniuersis et sin
gulis legiis et subditis'is' overwrites 'us'. nostris quorum Interest velle Interesse poterit
stricte precipiendo mandamus quatenus dictis preposito balliuis et
burgensibus dicti burgi eorumque ministris et seruitoribus in omnibus
et singulis eschaetacionem dictorum bonorum concernentibus
et deportacionem eorumdem ad vsus nostros ut premittitur prompte
respondeant pareant et Intendeant et quod in contrarium presencium nulla
tenus deuenire presumant temporibus pro futuris sub omni
pena que competere poterit In hac parte presentibus pro nostra
voluntate duraturum datum sub magno sigillo nostro Apud
Edinburgh nono die mensis Octobris Anno Domini millesimo
quadringentesimo quinquagesimo Octauo et Regni nostri vicesimo
Secundo

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xjo
die mensis Augusti anno quo supra

The saide day the aldirman eftir the warning of the haile tone
be the handbell and opinly warnit and chargit ale ande Sundrie
burges and Induellaris of this burghe betuix Sexty and Sextene
yeris to be redy weile abilyet for weir' with xl days wittalis
to pas' to the kingis hienes eftir the tenor' of the proclamacion
be our Souerane lordis lettres maid tharvpone

div.head: the thingis grantit to the reformacion of the queir'
div.p:
The saide day ale Ande sundrie the personis vndir writin has
oblist thame thar' ayris executouris Ande assignez' be the fathtis of thar'
bodiis in the Souerast wys' of obligacion one thar' avne freln will
motyve benevolence and mynde In the honor' of almychtie god
the blyssit virgine mary Sanct Nicholes' patrone to this burghe
and thame Ande ale Sanctis for the Remissione of thar' demeritis
and to content refunde and pay thankfullie but Impediment or demavnd'
to the aldirman balyeis or mastir of kirk werk for the tyme of this
burghe the Somes of gudis and money vndir writin to the byinge
of the leid' and ale vthir Stuff convenient for the queir' of thare
parys' kirk of Abirdene and to the reperalinge and reperacion of the samyn
that is to say Alexander Rede aldirman ane barrel of Salmonde
Alexander chamer ane barrele of Salmond Alexander menyes j barrel Salmond'
and jc lenterinvar' Robert blinsele j barrel Salmond and xviij s' Dauid
menyes ane barrele of Salmond' Johne Colisone ane barrel Salmond' thomas
prat ane barrel of Salmond Johne Culan ane barrel Salmond Androw
Culan eldar demi barrel salmond Androw branche demi barrel salmond Dauid mar'
v s' Alexander mar' ane barrel of girls' or' Salmond Dauid matheson'
demi barrel Salmond Jonhne Wormet ane barrel of Salmond Androw murray
eldar demi barrel salmond William andirsone eldar j quartar of jc lamskinnis Alexander
nachty v s' William nicholsone v s' Jonhne grige j demi barrel salmonde
Thomas mar' demi barell salmond Alexander angosone vj s' and j dusan futf'f' overwrites 'u'.ale'
Jonhne lammyntone v s' or j quartar of jc lenterinvair Richerd hill
yongar ij dusane lenterinvair' Johne moir' x s' Androw Culan demi barrel
Salmond and jc lenterinvair' William goldsmitht v s' Dauid
theman v s' Androw Waus v s' Jonhne Waus demi barrel of girls'
Richerd litstar' v s' Dauid Spens demi barrel Salmond William
Coupar iij s' Robert evinsone j dusan of futfale' William
murray j dusan futuale thomas chapman j dusan futuale William
moir' j dusane of lenterinware thome gardiner ij s' Alexander prat j
dusane of futuale Alexander talyour' in futy ij s' Androw lousone v s'
Cristy prat v s' Donald' baxtar xij d' William Cuming xij d' murtho
blak ij dusane lenterinvair' thome Smyth xij d' Jonhne tulibo j quartar
of jc lenterinvair' Androw smyth yongar xij d' Johne Williamsone j dusan futuale
Androw smyth ij s' Jonhne lundoris iij s' Androw hall xij d' James
Smyth xij d' Robert flessar' j dusan futuale Johne loremar' xviij d'
Will gray talyour' xij d' Johne annane j dusan futuale William philp
j quartar of jc lenterinvair' Alexander talyour' xij d' William ranisone iiij s'
Richard baxtar ij s' Johne selby j dusan lenterinvair' Jonhne low smyth
xviij d' Alexander malisone j dusan lenterinvair' patrik baxtar nicholsone xxx d'
Jonhne Sanclar' xl d' Alexander crage iij s' Alane litstar' xxtj s' thome
matland' ij s' thomas Waus demi barrel girls' Richard Waus demi barrel girs'
thomas menyeis demi barrel girls' mathow branche j dusan lenterinvar demi barrel Salmond Alexander
myrtone j dusan futuale Jonhne retre demi barrel Salmond' Walter atkin
iiijor s' William Wormet and his modir j barrel Salmond William blinsel
demi barrel Salmond lindesay harralde x s' Jonhne Kintor iij s' Alexander chamer
the Sone demi barrel Salmond Jonhne blak at the key xx s' Richard hill
eldar v s' Dauid murray x s' Eduard top v s' patrik rede demi barrel salmond'
Alexander chamer of murchil j barrel salmond' for my lord of Arbrothocis the widew
of Dauid Colisone j barrel of Salmond thomas meldrum v s' Androw Wat
